Texts.Chs: 在^orange;极暗狩猎场^reset;中找到^orange;神器^reset;
Texts.Eng: Find the ^orange;artifact^reset; in ^green;the Dark Hunting Grounds^reset;

Texts.Chs: 英雄取来了神器，拯救了宇宙。对吗？在其他维度中不是。那为什么还不动身？去找到第一个。看看凯文是否在那里。
Texts.Eng: Hero fetches artifacts, saves universe. Right? Not in other reality. Why not? Go find first one. See if Kevin was there.

Texts.Chs: 凯文接触了神器，当然，而且......哎哟！他留下了满身的鸟屎。他让它沾上了鸟屎! 肮脏的臭虫用它在光泽上刻下了 “凯文到此一游”。嗯......不过有新签名的信标。
Texts.Eng: Kevin touched artifact, definitely, and...eww! He left it covered in raptor piss! Dirty stinker used it to etch 'Kevin was here' in the shiny. Hmm...have beacon with new signature though.
